text: [Battle Historia Goal] The goal of the adventure is to defeat the Boss at the end. Check Map>Boss for details on the Boss.
[Battle Historia Special Rule 1] During the adventure, your party's HP and LP will be carried over in battles. Try not to take too much damage.
[Battle Historia Special Rule 2] All skills are set to Rank 99, and all Styles are fixed to Lv 30. Styles abilities will all be available.
[Assigning Warriors] The adventure begins with a party made from scratch. When starting Historia, you will have five random Styles assigned to your party.
[Types of Tiles on Maps] On the map, there are many types of tiles such as Style, Event, Party Ability, Normal Foe, and Mighty Foe.
[Style Tile] A type of tile on the map. Choose 1 out of 3 Styles to swap with an existing member in your party.
[Party Ability Tile] A type of tile on the map. Choose 1 out of 3 party abilities.
[Normal Foe Tile] A type of tile on the map. Start a battle with an enemy. The further you go, the stronger the enemies.
[Mighty Foe Tile] A type of tile on the map. Start a battle with a mighty foe. Party members will develop greatly and you will get better rewards.
[Surprise Attack] Before a battle, Normal Foe battles will have a chance to become Mighty Foe battles.
[Treasure Chest Tile] A type of tile on the map. If the treasure chest is opened successfully, your party will be enhanced, but there will be a penalty if you failed to open the chest.
[Treasure Chests (Appears by chance)] When moving to the next tile, a treasure chest will have a chance to appear. Decide carefully whether or not to open the chest.
[Grasp/Learn when Recruiting Warriors] When recruiting a warrior, the new recruit will learn the number of skills/spells of the Style that left your party.
[Style Change] You can swap Styles of the same character on Style tiles. Styles of the same character cannot be in the party at the same time.
[Dodge Skill] In Battle Historia, you can learn dodge skills. Once a dodge skill is learned, you will evade the skill/spell completely when an enemy uses it.
[Grasp/Learn] In Battle Historia, Styles can learn skills/spells of different weapon types and spell affinity.
[Item] Consume items in battles to help the party pre-action. The effect amount is based on the average of the party's attributes.
[Party Ability] Abilities that can only be used in Battle Historia. The effect applies to the entire party.
[HP Recovery on Map] Styles with 2 or more LP can use 1 LP to fully restore HP.
[Give Up] Give up on the adventure and exit Historia. If you think you cannot make any more progress on the map, you can choose to give up the current map.
[Results] On the Result screen, you can view your adventure log. Review your own unique adventure.
